title: Implementing controls using the Gamepad API
summary: The Gamepad API is very easy to develop with. Now it's easier than ever to deliver a console-like experience to the browser without the need for any plugins. You can play the full version of the Hungry Fridge game directly in your browser. Check the other resources on the Gamepad API Content Kit.
